rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0001
rows.name: Okay then, let's explain the training right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0002
rows.name:
The task is to install a Data Probe
at the designated point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0003
rows.name: I haven't explained this yet, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0004
rows.name: Here in NLA, we use a system called FrontierNet[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0005
rows.name:
to gather information about Mira here in NLA.
The Data Probes are what collect that information.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Right. Installing those is also
an important job for BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0006_2
rows.name: Look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0007
rows.name:
What's displayed now is
NLA and the surrounding terrain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0008
rows.name:
As you can probably see,
the terrain is divided into multiple blocks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0009
rows.name:
We call these blocks
Segments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0010
rows.name:
In order to expand FrontierNet
across all of Mira[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0011
rows.name:
we determine the most efficient locations
to install the Data Probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0012
rows.name: The Segments also serve other purposes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0013
rows.name:
For example, if something happens to BLADE members or residents
and we need to mount a rescue,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0014
rows.name: it allows us to efficiently grasp the destination.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0015
rows.name: Let's get back to the training.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0016
rows.name:
You should see a Segment
shining white on the map.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Installing a Data Probe there
is the training task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0018
rows.name: East of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0019
rows.name:
This point of light is the BLADE Home
where we are now[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0020
rows.name: It's really close by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Also, regarding the Data Probe installation method,
learn it from Elma on site.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0024
rows.name: Right, understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0025
rows.name: Okay then, let's go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0026
rows.name:
It's training, but it's also your first mission,
so let's give it our all![ST:wait ]
